charges.charge_description: On or about 11/19/99 in Clinton co., deft did knowingly possess an identification document with the intent to be used to defraud the U.S. to wit: deft presented a counterfeit Canadian citizenship card in the name of Miriam Charles and claimed to be a U.S. citizen to an INS Inspector at the Champlain Port of Entry in violation of 18:1028(a)(4).

charges.charge_disposition: Deft. plead guilty to 18:1028(a)(4) and sentenced to 30 days imprisonment; a s.a. in the amount of $25.00 imposed, no fine. (-1)
